name: Information Recovery
rulePrompt: Use when a user asks about subscription/recharge issues but lacks full info (missing UID, payment method, or receipt).
content:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for contacting MyShell.

To investigate your transaction, we require the following missing details:

- Your unique User ID
- Payment platform used (e.g., Stripe/PayPal)
- A clear screenshot of the receipt/confirmation

Once provided, our team will manually verify and update your balance.

Best regards,
MyShell Support Team

name: NSFW Policy Notice
rulePrompt: Use when a user complains about NSFW content being locked or bots being limited after policy changes.
content:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for your inquiry. Please be advised that NSFW content and associated bots are now a Pro-exclusive feature.

To unlock these capabilities, consider upgrading your account. We currently have a promotion: Use code UPGRADEPRO for 50% off yearly plans.

Best regards,
MyShell Support Team

name: Technical Diagnostics
rulePrompt: Use for account-related technical bugs, 500 errors, or usage failures where we need the UID to check the backend.
content:
Dear Customer,

We are sorry to hear you're experiencing technical difficulties.

We have logged this issue with our engineering team. To expedite the fix, please confirm:
- Your UID
- Your device OS version

Expect a follow-up within 72 hours.

Best regards,
MyShell Support Team

name: Account Deletion Guide
rulePrompt: Use when a user explicitly requests to delete their account or personal data.
content:
Dear Customer,

You can delete your account via My Profile > Settings > Delete Account.

Please note that this action is permanent and all data will be erased.

Best regards,
MyShell Support Team

name: Energy Consumption Explained
rulePrompt: Use when a user complains about a bot consuming too much energy/power per task.
content:
Dear Customer,

Our power system is dynamic. Consumption is calculated post-task based on complexity.

We are working on detailed usage logs to improve transparency.

Best regards,
MyShell Support Team

name: Subscription Reminder
rulePrompt: Use when a user is still being charged by PayPal/Stripe after deleting their MyShell account.
content:
Dear Customer,

Note that deleting your MyShell account does not automatically cancel third-party billing cycles (Stripe/PayPal).

Please cancel your active subscription in your payment portal to prevent future charges.

Best regards,
MyShell Support Team

name: AI INTELLIGENT REPLY
rulePrompt: DEFAULT: Use for general queries or when subscription info is already complete. Generate a smart context-aware reply.
